card.name: Iron Fist
card.property: Spend your Chi — Interrupt: When you play an Iron fist event, remove 3 chi counters from here to resolve the "Special" ability. Master your Chi — Response: After you play an [[attack]], [[thwart]] or [[defense]] event, place 1 chi counter on Iron Fist.

alternate.name: Daniel Rand
alternate.property: Youth in K'un Lun — You may include up to 3 [[skill]] in your deck from aspects other than your own. Training was so hard in K'un Lun.

card.name: Colleen Wing
card.property: [star] Colleen Wing's basic attack gains piercing. Colleen and Misty formed a partnership as private investigators and called their firm Nightwing Restorations, Ltd.

card.name: Book of the Iron Fist
card.property: Resource: Exhaust Book of the Iron Fist → generate a [wild] resource for an event. "Everything from the Iron Fist of the past can be found in this book." —Wendell Rand

card.name: Master of Martial Arts
card.property: Events attached to this card may be played as if they were in your hand. Hero Action: Exhaust Master of Martial Arts → search the top 5 cards of your deck for an identity-specific event and attach it facedown to this card.

card.name: Lei Kung Traiing
card.property: Hero Response: After you play an event, exhaust Lei Kung Training → shuffle it into your deck. “Again!” —Lei Kung.

card.name: K'un Lun
card.property: Mystical Force — Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust K'un Lun → choose: • Heal 3 damage from your identity. • Heal 2 damage from another identity. • Heal 1 damage from an ally. One of the 7 cities of Heaven.

card.name: Dragon Fist
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, this attack gains overkill. Special: Stun an enemy. Shou Lao’s energy is quite spectacular!

card.name: Dragon Fist
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [energy] resource, this attack gains overkill. Special: Stun an enemy. Shou Lao’s energy is quite spectacular!

card.name: Ninjutsu
card.property: Hero Action: (thwart) : Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Special: Remove 2 threat from a scheme and confuse an enemy. Martial art strategy and tactics of espionage...

card.name: Ninjutsu
card.property: Hero Action: (thwart) : Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Special: Remove 2 threat from a scheme and confuse an enemy. Martial art strategy and tactics of espionage...

card.name: Muay Thai
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Special: Deal 2 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing. Knowing different martial arts help you manage all situations.

card.name: Muay Thai
card.property: Action de héros (attaque) : infligez 3 dégats à un ennemi. Special : infligez 2 dégâts à un ennemi. Défaussez toute carte d'état Tenace de la cible avant d'infliger les dégâts. La maîtrise des différents Arts Martiaux permet à l'Iron Fist de se sortir de toutes les situations. —Ms. Marvel

card.name: Tai Chi
card.property: Hero Action: Place 3 Chi counters on your identity. Special: Heal 3 damage from any character. "Stay still. My Chi will heal you." —Iron FIst

card.name: Tai Chi
card.property: Hero Action: Place 3 Chi counters on your identity. Special: Heal 3 damage from any character. "Stay still. My Chi will heal you." —Iron FIst

card.name: Fujian White Crane
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Special: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. “One more try!”

card.name: Fujian White Crane
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Special: Deal 3 damage to an enemy. “One more try!”

card.name: Protect K'un Lun
card.property: You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: Exhaust Daniel Rand → remove Protect K'un Lun from the game. Discard K'un Lun. If K'un Lun was not discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Forbidden Chamber
card.property: “Death of a father is life for the son.” Victory 0. When Revealed: Exhaust your identity. Place 1[per_hero] threat on each side scheme. [crisis]

card.name: Steel Serpent
card.property: You cannot attack other enemies while engaged with Steel Serpent. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Steel Serpent attacks, stun your identity. (Iron Fist’s nemesis minion.)

card.name: Memory of the Dragon
card.property: Peril. When Revealed: Choose to either place 1[per_hero] threat on a scheme or exhaust 1 character you control.

card.name: Memory of the Dragon
card.property: Peril. When Revealed: Choose to either place 1[per_hero] threat on a scheme or exhaust 1 character you control.

card.name: Memory of the Dragon
card.property: Peril. When Revealed: Choose to either place 1[per_hero] threat on a scheme or exhaust 1 character you control.
